defaultSnippets.label: InsertHeader - Insert static header value
defaultSnippets.description: Insert a header with a static literal value. Replace header name and value with your desired values.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**InsertHeader** - Insert a header with a static literal value.

Replace header name and value with your desired values.

**Use case:** Add metadata like source system name, environment, or version to all records for routing, filtering, or auditing.

defaultSnippets.label: InsertHeader - Insert topic name as header
defaultSnippets.description: Insert a header with metadata. Use ${topic}, ${partition}, or ${offset} as placeholders. Replace header name as needed.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**InsertHeader** - Insert a header with Kafka metadata.

Use `${topic}`, `${partition}`, or `${offset}` as placeholders. Replace header name as needed.

**Available placeholders:**
- `${topic}` - Source topic name
- `${partition}` - Partition number
- `${offset}` - Record offset

**Use case:** Track message origin for debugging, routing, or audit trails.
